    CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW MAJOR_SIZE
AS
SELECT S_MAJOR, COUNT(*) AS ST_NUM
FROM STUDENT
GROUP BY S_MAJOR;

    CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW ENROLL_2004 (S_ID, S_NAME, C_ID)
AS
SELECT S.S_ID, S.S_NAME, E.C_ID
FROM STUDENT S, ENROLL E
WHERE S.S_ID = E.S_ID 
AND E_YEAR = '2004';
